full_summary:
=====================================

### 23240-240624-Automatic Liquid Scintillation Counter
------------------------------------------

#### Contract Information

*   Reference Number: WS4467740704-Doc4467753615
*   Solicitation Number: WS4467740704
*   Publication Date: March 14, 2024
*   Tender Closing Date: March 29, 2024 14:00
*   Expected Contract Start Date: April 17, 2024
*   Procurement Category: Goods

#### Contract Description

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of Natural Resources (NRCan) invites suppliers to express their interest in providing a Liquid Scintillation Counter (LSC) with an oxidizer. The instrument is required to accurately measure 14C to near-background levels for the correct and low-level determination of 14C in biomass-derived fuels and their blends with petroleum.

#### Contract Award Method

This contract was awarded through an Exclusive Rights procurement method. Suppliers who are interested in bidding on this contract may submit a statement of capability by the closing date.

#### Contracting Entity

The contracting entity is the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC).

#### End-User Entity

The end-user entity is the Department of Natural Resources (NRCan).

#### Contact Information

Inquiries regarding this contract can be directed to Susi Kosmulalage at **susi.kosmulalage@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca**.

#### Trade Agreements

This contract is subject to the following trade agreements:
- Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
- Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
- North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
- Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
- Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
- Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
- Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
- Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
- Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
- Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
- World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)

#### Regions of Delivery

The regions of delivery for this contract are Alberta.

### Submitting Statements of Capability
---------------------------------------

Interested suppliers must submit their statement of capability by March 29,
